# AuraTrace Documentation

Welcome to the official documentation for [AuraTrace](https://github.com/Cosmos-Coder-Ray/AuraTrace.git) â€” the AI-powered data lineage and observability tool for Python. AuraTrace transparently traces data pipelines using pandas, Dask, and PyArrow, providing deep insights, quality checks, performance monitoring, and AI-assisted analysis.
